text:
Thankfully I've taken a bit of a break from Twitter for a couple days.
Seen several tweets re: doomscrooling & feeling 🤮. Even @zchagla 😱 ⤵️

But here to say happy Sunday! Let's hope today is a better day in #vaccine news, AZ news, #COVID19 cases? (Being truly optimistic). https://t.co/vD9O3nZzoG
